mapper.select: SELECT COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN FINANCIAL_TYPE = '수익' THEN FINANCIAL_AMOUNT ELSE 0 END), 0) - COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN FINANCIAL_TYPE = '지출' THEN FINANCIAL_AMOUNT ELSE 0 END), 0) FROM FINANCIAL_MANAGEMENT WHERE FINANCIAL_STATUS = 'Y' AND TRUNC(FINANCIAL_DATE, 'MM') = TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM')
SELECT COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN FINANCIAL_TYPE = '수익' THEN FINANCIAL_AMOUNT ELSE 0 END), 0) FROM FINANCIAL_MANAGEMENT WHERE FINANCIAL_STATUS = 'Y' AND TRUNC(FINANCIAL_DATE, 'MM') = TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM')
SELECT COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN FINANCIAL_TYPE = '지출' THEN FINANCIAL_AMOUNT ELSE 0 END), 0) FROM FINANCIAL_MANAGEMENT WHERE FINANCIAL_STATUS = 'Y' AND TRUNC(FINANCIAL_DATE, 'MM') = TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM')

SELECT COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN FINANCIAL_TYPE = '수익' THEN FINANCIAL_AMOUNT ELSE 0 END), 0) - COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN FINANCIAL_TYPE = '지출' THEN FINANCIAL_AMOUNT ELSE 0 END), 0) FROM FINANCIAL_MANAGEMENT WHERE FINANCIAL_STATUS = 'Y' AND FINANCIAL_DATE >= ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'), -1) AND FINANCIAL_DATE < TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM')

SELECT EXTRACT(MONTH FROM FINANCIAL_DATE) AS month, COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN CATEGORY = '광고' AND FINANCIAL_TYPE = '수익' THEN FINANCIAL_AMOUNT END), 0) AS AdTotalIncome, COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN CATEGORY = '굿즈' AND FINANCIAL_TYPE = '수익' THEN FINANCIAL_AMOUNT END), 0) AS MerchTotalIncome, COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN CATEGORY = '협찬' AND FINANCIAL_TYPE = '수익' THEN FINANCIAL_AMOUNT END), 0) AS SponTotalIncome, COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN CATEGORY = '후원' AND FINANCIAL_TYPE = '수익' THEN FINANCIAL_AMOUNT END), 0) AS DonationTotalIncome, COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN CATEGORY = '기타' AND FINANCIAL_TYPE = '수익' THEN FINANCIAL_AMOUNT END), 0) AS EtcTotalIncome,
COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN CATEGORY = '마케팅' AND FINANCIAL_TYPE = '지출' THEN FINANCIAL_AMOUNT END), 0) AS MarketTotalExpense, COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN CATEGORY = '소프트웨어' AND FINANCIAL_TYPE = '지출' THEN FINANCIAL_AMOUNT END), 0) AS SoftWareTotalExpense, COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN CATEGORY = '외주' AND FINANCIAL_TYPE = '지출' THEN FINANCIAL_AMOUNT END), 0) AS OutSourceTotalExpense, COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN CATEGORY = '장비' AND FINANCIAL_TYPE = '지출' THEN FINANCIAL_AMOUNT END), 0) AS EquipTotalExpense, COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN CATEGORY = '기타' AND FINANCIAL_TYPE = '지출' THEN FINANCIAL_AMOUNT END), 0) AS EtcTotalExpense FROM FINANCIAL_MANAGEMENT WHERE FINANCIAL_STATUS = 'Y' GROUP BY EXTRACT(MONTH FROM FINANCIAL_DATE) ORDER BY month

SELECT EXTRACT(MONTH FROM FINANCIAL_DATE) AS month, GREATEST( COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN FINANCIAL_TYPE = '수익' THEN FINANCIAL_AMOUNT ELSE 0 END), 0) - COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN FINANCIAL_TYPE = '지출' THEN FINANCIAL_AMOUNT ELSE 0 END), 0), 0 ) AS netProfitTotal, COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN FINANCIAL_TYPE = '수익' THEN FINANCIAL_AMOUNT ELSE 0 END), 0) AS ProfitTotal, COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN FINANCIAL_TYPE = '지출' THEN FINANCIAL_AMOUNT ELSE 0 END), 0) AS expenseTotal FROM FINANCIAL_MANAGEMENT WHERE FINANCIAL_STATUS = 'Y' GROUP BY EXTRACT(MONTH FROM FINANCIAL_DATE) ORDER BY month

SELECT category, amount FROM ( SELECT CATEGORY as category, SUM(FINANCIAL_AMOUNT) AS amount, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY SUM(FINANCIAL_AMOUNT) DESC) AS RN FROM FINANCIAL_MANAGEMENT WHERE FINANCIAL_STATUS = 'Y' AND FINANCIAL_TYPE = '수익' AND FINANCIAL_DATE >= ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'), -2) AND FINANCIAL_DATE < ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'), 1) GROUP BY CATEGORY ) WHERE RN <= 3
UNION ALL
SELECT category, amount FROM ( SELECT CATEGORY as category, SUM(FINANCIAL_AMOUNT) AS amount, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY SUM(FINANCIAL_AMOUNT) DESC) AS RN FROM FINANCIAL_MANAGEMENT WHERE FINANCIAL_STATUS = 'Y' AND FINANCIAL_TYPE = '지출' AND FINANCIAL_DATE >= ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'), -2) AND FINANCIAL_DATE < ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'), 1) GROUP BY CATEGORY ) WHERE RN <= 3
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FINANCIAL_MANAGEMENT ( FINANCIAL_ID, CONTRACT_ID, MEMBER_ID, FINANCIAL_NAME, FINANCIAL_AMOUNT, FINANCIAL_DATE, FINANCIAL_STATUS, CATEGORY, FINANCIAL_TYPE ) VALUES ( SEQ_FID.NEXTVAL, #{contractId}, #{memberId}, #{financialName}, #{financialAmount}, #{financialDate}, 'Y', #{category}, #{financialType} )
mapper.select: SELECT FINANCIAL_ID, FINANCIAL_NAME, FINANCIAL_AMOUNT, FINANCIAL_DATE, FINANCIAL_STATUS, CATEGORY, FINANCIAL_TYPE FROM FINANCIAL_MANAGEMENT ORDER BY FINANCIAL_DATE DESC, FINANCIAL_ID DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{limit} ROWS ONLY
